Do you deal with Consumer Clients?

A consumer client is an individual whose habitual residence is in the UK. Click HERE for more information. The term 'deal' is used here in a very broad sense. It refers to providing lending services, other credit related services, debt services related to credit agreements, credit referencing services, peer to peer lending platforms which relate to consumer credit agreements and more. If you are not sure if you deal with consumer clients, please click 'yes' so you can confirm this by completing this questionnaire.

Whether you need a consumer credit license or not depends on who your customers are. if your customers are NOT consumers, for example if they are companies and you regularly provide them with loans, then you should take our intermediary questionnaire to check if you need to apply for another license.
